title: RESTORE_PLAYER_STAMINA
content:
0xA352C1B864CAFD330x62A93608// RestorePlayerStamina
void RESTORE_PLAYER_STAMINA(Player player, float percentage);Parameters:player: player to restore the stamina forpercentage: seems to be a percentage that ranges from 0.0 to 1.0 (1.0 being 100%)Adds a percentage to a players staminaExamples:LuaCitizen.CreateThread(function()
  while true do
    RestorePlayerStamina(PlayerId(), 0.3)
    Citizen.Wait(15000) -- 15 seconds
  end
end)
codeBlocks:
// RestorePlayerStamina
void RESTORE_PLAYER_STAMINA(Player player, float percentage);

local player = source
-- Example usage for RESTORE_PLAYER_STAMINA
RestorePlayerStamina(player, 0.0)
